column4: Can anybody help me? How come my movie freezes while I'm watching it? This didn't happen to me in Windows, so it's not my computer's fault
that is a bad cause and effect.
no nproblem but your question makes no sense it is lacking any real substance.
There's no "bad cause and effect", using Windows I was able to watch movies with ease, now I can't, therefore it's not my hardware but rather my software.
